#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        int a[n];
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cin >> a[i];
        int i = 0, j = n - 1;
        sort(a, a + n);
        while (i < j) {
            cout << a[j] << ' ';
            cout << a[i] << ' ';
            ++i, --j;
        }
        if (i == j) cout << a[i];
        cout << endl;
    }
}
